name: [AA] Special Operations Department
description:
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
[ALPHA AUTHORITY] Mission Control
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
Decomissioned October 13th, 2018
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
Alpha Authority Mission Control has been decommissiond in replacement for Alpha Authority's High Command & Council. 

The history of Mission Control dates back to November 13th, 2013, as an account called AAMissionControl. It acted as a holder of our guides, forums, and became part of the group's lore. Later, AAMissionControl was banned in 2016, but its name came apart of our group hierchy in the April of 2017.
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
